title: Genre-Based Intensive Course for Improving EFL Writing Skills in Science Domains

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Conducted in a blended learning environment using digital devices, this program emphasizes enhancing job-related writing skills for science managers/leaders.

learning_goals: Learners can apply a structured English writing process tailored to the scientific report genre
Learners can correct over 80% of academic/professional writing errors through a peer feedback system
Learners can complete scientific experiment reports following a genre-based approach (modeling-co-construction-independent writing-feedback)
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
